articles.description: The wife of Arsenal striker Kai Havertz has shared screenshots of abuse she received after Sunday's FA Cup loss to Manchester United including threats to the couple's unborn child.
articles.title: Kai Havertz's wife reveals social media abuse after Man Utd defeat

articles.description: Wales names Ospreys fly-half Dan Edwards and Scarlets wing Ellis Mee as two uncapped players in a 34-man squad for the 2025 Six Nations.

articles.description: Arsenal's season is in the balance, as their FA Cup exit highlights manager Mikel Arteta's failure to sign a striker.
